scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push
scripts.deploy: npm run release && ssh max@server.unsou.de 'docker pull registry.server.unsou.de/spotify-current-song:latest && docker rm -f spotify-current-song && docker run -d --restart unless-stopped -e "VIRTUAL_HOST=save-song.server.unsou.de" -e "LETSENCRYPT_HOST=save-song.server.unsou.de" -e "LETSENCRYPT_EMAIL=max@unsou.de" --name spotify-current-song registry.server.unsou.de/spotify-current-song:latest'
